body_html:
Have you done this part?:

sudo apt-get install autoconf automake libtool curl make g++ unzip
pushd .
cd tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/protobuf
./autogen.sh
./configure
make
make check
sudo make install
sudo ldconfig # refresh shared library cache
popd

More generally, does the issue reproduce when following the steps documented in this section?

body:
Have you done this part?:

``` bash
sudo apt-get install autoconf automake libtool curl make g++ unzip
pushd .
cd tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/protobuf
./autogen.sh
./configure
make
make check
sudo make install
sudo ldconfig # refresh shared library cache
popd
```

More generally, does the issue reproduce when following the steps documented in [this section](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/README.md#building-on-linux)?
